languages.text: {n}Во тьме мрачного забрала, скрывающего лицо чудовища, вам на мгновение удается встретиться с ним взглядом. Существо поспешно поворачивает голову и угрожающе рычит, но вы уверены — в его глазах промелькнуло что-то человеческое. Страх, скорбь, или может быть... стыд?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Во тьме мрачного забрала, скрывающего лицо чудовища, вам на мгновение удается встретиться с ним взглядом. Существо поспешно поворачивает голову и угрожающе рычит, но вы уверены — в его глазах промелькнуло что-то человеческое. Страх, скорбь, или может быть... стыд?{/n}

languages.text: {n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Во тьме мрачного забрала, скрывающего лицо чудовища, вам на мгновение удается встретиться с ним взглядом. Существо поспешно поворачивает голову и угрожающе рычит, но вы уверены — в его глазах промелькнуло что-то человеческое. Страх, скорбь, или может быть... стыд?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment you manage to meet the monster's gaze inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

{n}For a brief moment you manage to meet the monster's gaze inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

languages.text: {n}一瞬、バイザーの狭い暗闇の中で怪物と目が合った。怪物は慌てて背を向け、うなり声を上げたが、あなたはその目に人間的な何かを垣間見たと確信した。恐怖か、悲しみか、それとも…羞恥心なのか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、バイザーの狭い暗闇の中で怪物と目が合った。怪物は慌てて背を向け、うなり声を上げたが、あなたはその目に人間的な何かを垣間見たと確信した。恐怖か、悲しみか、それとも…羞恥心なのか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}有什么一瞬间，你的目光锁定了藏在黑暗面具之下的那只眼睛。怪物急忙转过了身，咆哮着，但你非常确信，你在它的眼睛中窥见了属于人类的感情。或许是恐惧，或许是悲伤，又或许是……羞愧？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有什么一瞬间，你的目光锁定了藏在黑暗面具之下的那只眼睛。怪物急忙转过了身，咆哮着，但你非常确信，你在它的眼睛中窥见了属于人类的感情。或许是恐惧，或许是悲伤，又或许是……羞愧？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durante un momento, tus ojos se encuentran con los del monstruo, pegados al otro lado de su visor oscuro. La criatura aparta rápidamente la mirada y gruñe, pero no te cabe duda de que has detectado algo humano en sus ojos. Miedo, tal vez, o pena, o incluso... ¿vergüenza?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durante un momento, tus ojos se encuentran con los del monstruo, pegados al otro lado de su visor oscuro. La criatura aparta rápidamente la mirada y gruñe, pero no te cabe duda de que has detectado algo humano en sus ojos. Miedo, tal vez, o pena, o incluso... ¿vergüenza?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einen kurzen Augenblick lang blickst du dem Monster in der engen Dunkelheit des Visors in die Augen. Die Kreatur wendet sich hastig ab und knurrt, aber du bist dir sicher, dass du etwas Menschliches in ihren Augen erkannt hast. Angst vielleicht oder Trauer oder vielleicht sogar ... Scham?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einen kurzen Augenblick lang blickst du dem Monster in der engen Dunkelheit des Visors in die Augen. Die Kreatur wendet sich hastig ab und knurrt, aber du bist dir sicher, dass du etwas Menschliches in ihren Augen erkannt hast. Angst vielleicht oder Trauer oder vielleicht sogar ... Scham?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré son masque, vous parvenez à croiser le regard de la créature qui se retourne immédiatement en grognant. Ce contact visuel n'aura duré qu'une seconde, mais vous êtes {mf|certain|certaine} d'y avoir décelé des émotions humaines. De la peur, du chagrin ou peut-être même... de la honte ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré son masque, vous parvenez à croiser le regard de la créature qui se retourne immédiatement en grognant. Ce contact visuel n'aura duré qu'une seconde, mais vous êtes {mf|certain|certaine} d'y avoir décelé des émotions humaines. De la peur, du chagrin ou peut-être même... de la honte ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dar vizörün gölgesine sığınmış canavarla bir anlığına göz göze geliyorsun. Yaratık, alelacele bakışlarını çevirerek hırıldasa da gözlerinde insani bir şeyler gördüğünden eminsin. Korku ya da... Matem olabilir. Yoksa bu... Utanç mı?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you lock eyes with the monster inside the cramped dark of the visor. The creature hastily turns away and growls, but you are certain you have glimpsed something human in its eyes. Fear, perhaps, or grief, or maybe even... shame?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir anlığına dar vizörün gölgesindeki canavarla göz göze geliyorsun. Yaratık, alelacele bakışlarını çevirerek hırıldanıyor ancak gözlerinde insani bir şeyler gördüğünden eminsin. Belki korku ya da... Matem. Hatta belki de... Utanç?{/n}
